actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend the preference accorded Veterans' Administration medical and health personnel for attendance at regional medical education centers.

summary.text: Extends to all career personnel of the Veterans Administration the preference for attendance at Regional Medical Education Centers heretofore limited only to V.A. medical and health personnel.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend the preference accorded Veterans' Administration medical and health personnel for attendance at regional medical education centers.
